sentences.sContent: She smoked and drank, neglected the children, and left the clothes unmended.
sentences.sCn: 她抽烟喝酒，既不照顾孩子，也不缝补衣服。

sentences.sContent: The building has been badly neglected.
sentences.sCn: 这栋大楼严重疏于维护。

sentences.sContent: Many of these ideas have been neglected by modern historians.
sentences.sCn: 这些观点有许多都被现代的历史学家忽略了。
